name: newrelic-azure-functions
description: This repository contains functions to collect and forward logs from Microsoft Azure Blob Storage and Event Hubs.

scripts.package:eventhubforwarder: mkdir -p EventHubForwarder && cp LogForwarder/index.js EventHubForwarder/index.js && cp LogForwarder/EventHubForwarder/function.json EventHubForwarder/function.json  && zip -r EventHubForwarder.zip EventHubForwarder/function.json EventHubForwarder/index.js host.json package.json && rm -rf EventHubForwarder
scripts.package:blobforwarder: mkdir -p BlobForwarder && cp LogForwarder/index.js BlobForwarder/index.js && cp LogForwarder/BlobForwarder/function.json BlobForwarder/function.json  && zip -r BlobForwarder.zip BlobForwarder/function.json BlobForwarder/index.js host.json package.json && rm -rf BlobForwarder
